column13: In FY23, South32 developed a mine closure plan for the Hermosa project, where it is undertaking feasibility and pre-feasibility studies for the Taylor and Clark Deposits, respectively. column13: South32 monitors air quality using sensitive receptors inside and outside of site gates.
